text: In computer science, ZISC stands for Zero Instruction Set Computer, which refers to a chip technology based on pure pattern matching and absence of micro-instructions. The name ZISC was derived from RISC. ==Other websites== *From CISC to RISC to ZISC by S. Liebman on lsmarketing.com *Neural Networks on Silicon at aboutAI.net *Open Directory: Hardware: Components: Processors: ZISC *Recognetics Home of CogniMem the successor of ZISC Category:Computer architecture
title: Zero instruction set computer
